public int getMaximum(int field)
Overrides:
getMaximum in class java.util.GregorianCalendar

getInstance

public static java.util.Calendar getInstance()

addWeekDays

public void addWeekDays(int offset)
Adds a value to the weekdays. Weekends are ignored in this calculation.

clearTime

public void clearTime()
Clears the time entries in the calendar by setting it to midnight.

getNextDayOfWeekOffset

public int getNextDayOfWeekOffset(int dayOfWeek)
Gets the number of days to the next occurance of the day of the week. If the day of the week is today, then the following week's day is returned.

Parameters:
dayOfWeek - The day of the week to find the offset to
Returns:
The number of days between the requested day of the week and the current date on the calendar.

setNextDayOfWeek

public void setNextDayOfWeek(int dayOfWeek)
Sets the calendar to the next occurance of the day of the week. If the day of the week is today, then the following week's day is set.

Parameters:
dayOfWeek - The day of the week to set the calendar to

setSimulatorDate

public void setSimulatorDate()
Sets the calendar date for the Commodities application to an alternative date.

clearSimulatorDate

public void clearSimulatorDate()
Sets the calendar date for the Commodities application to today's date.
